1.1: The Event has been started! You may start hitting on the snowball or the snowman now.

10.1: Please remember that if you die during the event, you'll be eliminated from the game. You still have plenty of time left, so either take a potion or recover HP first before moving on.

11.1: If neither team reaches the finish line on time, then the team who rolls the snowball closest to the end wins, so please don't give up!

12.1: The huge thorns near the finish line pops up from the ground and takes away a huge chunk of HP, so please beware of it while rolling the snowball.

13.1: Your attack will not work if you keep attacking while staying at one place. You'll have to move little by little while attacking the snowman or the snowball.

14.1: You'll return to the starting point once touched by the snowball, so please be careful while attacking.

15.1: You have 3 minutes left. Please don't give up!

16.1: If neither team reaches the finish line on time, then the team who rolls the snowball closest to the end wins, so please don't give up!

17.1: You have 1 min. left. If neither team reaches the finish line on time, then the team who rolls the snowball closest to the end wins, so please don't give up!
